alert.note: Alert for Beadle; Jerauld; Kingsbury; Miner; Sanborn (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 03 at 3:00PM MDT until July 03 at 3:45PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Kingsbury County in east central South Dakota... Sanborn County in east central South Dakota... Southeastern Beadle County in east central South Dakota... Eastern Jerauld County in central South Dakota... Western Miner County in east central South Dakota... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 400 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Alpena, or 14 miles south of Huron, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Forestburg around 420 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Artesian, Carthage, Fedora and Roswell. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Sioux Falls.
